summary: The National Transportation Safety Board investigates and reports on the probable causes of transportation accidents and issues recommendations to improve safety. NTSB reports having about the same number of employees as it had 20 years ago. But the transportation sector has experienced tremendous growth and technological advancement in that time. While NTSB has taken steps to improve its management and operations, it needs to do...
title: National Transportation Safety Board: Additional Actions Needed to Improve Management and Operations
